name: HackQuest
fullText:
The Mantle Global Hackathon 2025 is here!
Hosted by @Mantle_Official @HackQuest_ @OpenBuildxyz

Build on Mantle’s modular ecosystem to connect real assets with real yield.
$150K to win across 6+ tracks.

From Oct 22, 2025 – Feb 7, 2026.

Register now 🧵👇
